title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: There is a bug where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor (Photon).
OB: When a user opens a Java editor and right-clicks on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu appears to add breakpoints or marks.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a user right-clicks on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear to add breakpoints or marks.
